alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Globe, Miami; Northwest Pinal County; Parker Valley; San Carlos; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 12 at 1:23AM MST until January 12 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the mid to upper 20s. * WHERE...Parker Valley, Central La Paz County, Aguila Valley, Superior, Northwest Pinal County, Tonto Basin, San Carlos and Globe/Miami. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Globe, Miami; Northwest Pinal County; Parker Valley; San Carlos; Superior; Tonto Basin
